data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Distrito Federal, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Distrito Federal, Brazil
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Distrito Federal, Brazil.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Distrito Federal, Brazil.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Distrito Federal, Brazil who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Carabayo people. Make the Carabayo people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Distrito Federal, Brazil. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Distrito Federal, Brazil to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.section_summary:
the state of Distrito Federal, Brazil has a population of 2,648,500.

We estimate Distrito Federal has 660,515 people who might know Jesus, 1,717,317 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 270,669 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Distrito Federal, Brazil a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.
